#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

char c[1011];

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		long long k;
		scanf("%s %lld",c, &k);
		int l = strlen(c);
		vector <int> v;
		long long n = k;
		while(n!=0)
		{
			if(n%2)
				v.push_back(1);
			else 
				v.push_back(0);
			n = n/2;
		}
		vector <int> ans;
		int carry = 0;
		for(int i=0;i<max(l,(int)v.size());i++)
		{
			int y,x;
			if(i>=v.size())
				y = 0;
			else y = v[i];

			if(i >= l)
				x = 0;
			else x = c[l-i-1]-'0';

			int temp = y + x + carry;
			carry = temp/2;
			ans.push_back(temp%2);
		}
		if(carry)
			ans.push_back(1);

		for(int i=0; i<ans.size(); i++) {
			printf("%d", ans[(int)ans.size()-i-1]);
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
